title: Custom maps?
body: am i allowed to use winter rift with wooxy?

replies.body:
quoting riot. 

"For now, custom models and artwork sit firmly in the “use-at-your-own-risk” category, but we’re keeping an eye on them. We can’t optimize for assets we don’t develop."

so no you can't use a custom map unless it the old summoner rift map. but hopefully the "game" doesn't detect it as a script. 

72 out of 126 found this helpful.  

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} {{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

btw now i want to play jinx, smile it's called gunplay!

I think the most appropriate response for these is-> [**Third Party Programs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848).

If it directly alters or pulls game data while League is running, there's a chance it could be detected as a script. Read over our general stance on third-party programs in the FAQ I linked above.
